TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PersistenceIOParticipant extends System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant
Public MustInherit Class PersistenceIOParticipant Inherits PersistenceParticipant

summary.span: 类的派生类，其中的方法除通过持久性进程保留和加载工作流实例外，还执行输入和输出操作。

span.span: A derived vclass of the class with methods that perform input and output operations in addition to the persisting and loading of workflow instances through the persistence process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宿主在保留实例时执行以下步骤（或阶段）：A host executes the following steps (or stages) when persisting an instance: 1. 收集要保留的值。Collects values to be persisted. 2. 将整体结构化类的字段映射到单独的值。Maps fields of monolithic structured values to individual values. 3. 向持久性提供程序发出 。Issues the to the persistence provider. 4. 在持久性事务下执行 I/O。Performs I/O under the persistence transaction. 宿主将完成一个阶段，之后再开始下一个阶段。A host completes a stage before beginning the next stage. 例如，在保留时，宿主将从所有持久性参与者处收集值，之后再转移到第二个阶段。For example when persisting, the host collects values from all the persistence participants before moving to the second stage. 在第二个阶段中，宿主会将第一个阶段中收集的所有值提供给第二个阶段中的所有持久性参与者进行映射。In the second stage, the host provides all the values collected in the first stage to all persistence participants in the second stage for mapping. 在第三个阶段中，宿主会在调用 时将第一个和第二个阶段中收集的所有值提供给持久性提供程序。In the third stage, the host provides all the collected values in the first and second stages to the persistence provider when invoking the . 然后，在第四个阶段中，主机会在持久性事务下将所有收集的值提供给所有持久性 IO 参与者。Then in the fourth stage, the host provides all the collected values to all the persistence IO participants under the persistence transaction. 宿主在加载持久性实例时将执行以下阶段：A host executes the following stages when loading a persistence instance: 1. 向持久性提供程序发出 和 。Issues the and to the persistence provider. 2. 在持久性事务下执行 I/O。Performs I/O under the persistence transaction. 3. 发布加载的值。Publishes the loaded values. 在最高级别，派生自 类的工作流实例扩展可以参与保留过程的第一个阶段（收集）和第二个阶段（映射），以及加载过程的第三个阶段（发布）。At the highest level, workflow instance extensions that derive from the class can participate in the first (Collect) and second (Map) stages of persisting process and the third stage (Publish) of loading process. 派生自 PersistenceIOParticipant 类的工作流实例扩展另外还可以参与保留过程的第四个阶段以及加载过程的第二个阶段 (I/O)。Workflow instance extensions deriving from the PersistenceIOParticipant class can additionally participate in the fourth stage of the persisting process and the second stage of the loading process (I/O).

MemberSignature.Value: protected PersistenceIOParticipant (bool isSaveTransactionRequired, bool isLoadTransactionRequired);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isSaveTransactionRequired, bool isLoadTransactionRequired) cil managed
Protected Sub New (isSaveTransactionRequired As Boolean, isLoadTransactionRequired As Boolean)
protected: PersistenceIOParticipant(bool isSaveTransactionRequired, bool isLoadTransactionRequired);

param.name: isSaveTransactionRequired
param.span: 如果保存操作需要事务，则为 。

span.span: if a transaction is required for the Save operation.

param.span: 如果在此参数设置为 的情况下创建了 对象，则在调用 BeginOnSave 时必定会设置 Transaction.Current。

span.span: If the object is created with this parameter set to , Transaction.Current is guaranteed to be set when BeginOnSave is invoked.

param.span: 事务将在持久性提供程序、所有 PersistenceIOParticipant 扩展并可能在其他事务参与者之间共享。

span.span: The transaction is shared between the persistence provider, all PersistenceIOParticipant extensions, and potentially other transaction participants.

param.name: isLoadTransactionRequired
param.span: 如果加载操作需要事务，则为 。

span.span: if a transaction is required for the Load operation.

param.span: 如果在此参数设置为 的情况下创建了 对象，则在调用 BeginOnLoad 时必定会设置 Transaction.Current。

span.span: If the object is created with this parameter set to , Transaction.Current is guaranteed to be set when BeginOnLoad is invoked.

param.span: 事务将在持久性提供程序、所有 PersistenceIOParticipant 扩展并可能在其他事务参与者之间共享。

span.span: The transaction is shared between the persistence provider, all PersistenceIOParticipant extensions, and potentially other transaction participants.
Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract void Abort ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abort() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub Abort ()
protected: abstract void Abort();

summary.span: 中止挂起的 IO（加载或保存）操作。

span.span: Aborts the pending IO (Load or Save) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写 BeginOnSave 或 BeginOnLoad 并可能无法始终立即完成的派生类必须重写 Abort。Derived classes that override BeginOnSave or BeginOnLoad and might not always complete immediately must override Abort. 如果调用了 Abort，则必须取消任何挂起的 IO 操作。If Abort is invoked, any pending IO operations must be canceled. 如果采用这种方式取消操作，则对应的 End 方法应引发 OperationCanceledException。If an operation is canceled in this way, the corresponding End method should throw OperationCanceledException.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual IAsyncResult BeginOnLoad (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,object> readWriteValues, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginOnLoad(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, object> readWriteValues, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function BeginOnLoad (readWriteValues As IDictionary(Of XName, Object), timeout As TimeSpan, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult

protected: virtual IAsyncResult ^ BeginOnLoad(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ readWriteValues, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: readWriteValues
param.span: 由持久性提供程序所加载的读/写值组成的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of read-write values loaded by the persistence provider.

param.span: 这对应于在此实例最近的持久性段中传递到 BeginOnSave 的读/写值集。

span.span: This corresponds to the set of read-write values passed to BeginOnSave in the most recent persistence episode for this instance.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 时间跨度，操作应在该时间跨度内完成而不超时。

span.span: The time span within which the operation should be completed without timing out.

param.name: callback
param.span: 可接收异步加载操作完成通知的异步回调委托。

span.span: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous Load operation.

param.name: state
param.span: 与异步操作关联的状态信息。

span.span: The state information associated with the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，以便连同正在从实例存储中加载的实例一起加载附加状态。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to load additional state in conjunction with an instance being loaded from the instance store.
The status of an asynchronous operation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual IAsyncResult BeginOnSave (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,object> readWriteValues, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,object> writeOnlyValues, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

param.name: readWriteValues
param.span: 由 CollectValues 和 MapValues 阶段中收集的读/写值组成的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of read-write values collected in the CollectValues and MapValues stages.

param.name: writeOnlyValues
param.span: 由 CollectValues 和 MapValues 阶段中收集的只写值组成的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of write-only values collected in the CollectValues and MapValues stages.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 时间跨度，操作应在该时间跨度内完成而不超时。

span.span: The time span within which the operation should be completed without timing out.

param.name: callback
param.span: 可接收异步操作完成通知的异步回调接收委托。

span.span: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.

param.name: state
param.span: 与异步操作关联的状态信息。

span.span: The state information associated with the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，以便连同正在保留到实例存储中的实例一起保存附加状态。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to save additional state in conjunction with an instance being persisted to the instance store.
The status of an asynchronous operation.
